Trade/Device Name(s): POPS! one Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the POPS! one Blood Glucose Monitoring System using an electrochemical biosensor and integrated mobile app for self-monitoring blood glucose at home.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger, used by people with diabetes mellitus at home as an aid in monitoring the effectiveness of a diabetes control program; single-patient use only, not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
